alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 1:54PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Natrona County through 230 PM MDT... At 152 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles north of Alcova, or 22 miles west of Casper, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. A brief landspout is possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Natrona County. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
